sources.title: The Little Red Schoolhouse
sources.description: Title: The Little Red Schoolhouse Summary: Upset by discipline at school, a 17-year-old runs away to New York City and learns there are worse problems than going to his little red school house. Directed by: Charles Lamont Actors: Frank Coghlan Jr., Lloyd Hughes, Dickie Moore Production Company: Chesterfield Motion Pictures Corporation (I) Release Date: 2 March 1936 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Upset by discipline at school, a 17-year-old runs away to New York City and learns there are worse problems than going to his little red school house.

metadata.Plot: Upset by discipline at school, a 17-year-old runs away to New York City and learns there are worse problems than going to his little red school house.
